Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - LifeStream v0.1.1

Personal life dashboard application with the following services:

Services implemented:
- APOD \(NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day\) with history navigation and gallery
- BOM Radar with multi-range support \(64/128/256/512km\) and playback
- BOM Forecast with 7-day weather data

Core features:
- DevExpress WinForms UI with RibbonForm and DockManager
- Service manager with adaptive polling and refresh strategies
- Layout persistence \(save/load panel arrangements\)
- Services status panel for real-time monitoring
- Serilog logging with rolling daily files

Documentation:
- Architecture overview with implementation status
- Feature specifications for all implemented services
- System Monitor service specification \(planned next\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add System Monitor service with real-time charts - v0.2.0

Implements high-frequency system monitoring with:
- 1-second sampling via Windows PerformanceCounters
- Metrics: System/App CPU, Memory, Disk I/O, Network I/O
- Ring buffer storing 1 hour of history \(3600 samples\)
- 4 vertically stacked DevExpress charts
- Time range selector \(1 min to 1 hour views\)

New files:
- SystemMonitorService - IInformationService implementation
- MetricsCollector - PerformanceCounter wrapper
- RingBuffer<T> - Thread-safe circular buffer
- SystemMetrics - Data model
- SystemMonitorPanel - UI with charts

Updated MainForm panel layout \(Fill panel for System Monitor\).
Updated Architecture.md and feature documentation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
